question: From whom are the Acadians descended?
possible_answers: B. First Nations who began settling in what are now the Prairie provinces in 1600s
C. British colonists who began settling in what are now the Maritime provinces in 1604
D. French colonists who began settling in what are now the Maritime provinces in 1604
main_question: From whom are the Acadians descended?
answer: D. French colonists who began settling in what are now the Maritime provinces in 1604
explanatory_sentence: The Acadians are the descendants of French colonists who began settling in what are now the Maritime provinces in 1604.
